attributes.action: Make Facebook allow live gigs from musicians.
attributes.additional_details: It costs nothing. Hurts no-one, and can help people put food in the table.
attributes.background: FB are going to ban live gigs from singers trying to work in todays climate. They need to think again. No-one is forced to listen.

rejection.details:
This is a matter for Facebook, not the UK Government or Parliament.

You may wish to sign this petition instead: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/320711.
